DOC.brief_title: Suramin Plus Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Newly Diagnosed Glioblastoma Multiforme
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess toxicity suramin administer prior concurrent radiotherapy patient newly diagnose high grade glioblastoma multiforme . II . Evaluate regimen term survival patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive suramin IV 2 hour initial dose 1 hour subsequent dose daily 5 day week 1 . Patients receive concurrent radiotherapy daily suramin IV 1 hour twice weekly week 2-7 . Patients stable responsive disease receive second course suramin twice weekly week 20-24 . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2 month disease progression start new therapy monthly survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 54 patient accrue study 1.5 year .
